verses.verse: And <S%H310>after<s%> this it came to <S%H1732>pass<s%>, that David <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and <S%H3665>subdued<s%> <S%H1732>them<s%>: and David <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4965>bridle<s%> of the mother city out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H5333>garrisons<s%> in <S%H758>Syria<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>; and the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> became <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H5375>brought<s%> <S%H4503>tribute<s%>. And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> gave <S%H3467>victory<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> whithersoever he <S%H1980>went<s%>.
